name: Indianitjobs.github.io
tagline: Job Portal for Indian It Professionals
body:
### About Indian IT Jobs
This Community has been created to get each and every Engineer to assist engineering professionals and aspiring engineers by providing them with information related to their profession specific to the Indian IT market. It gives fresher, experienced professionals and organizations an opportunity to interact with each other on a trusted online network. check here our page [Indian IT Jobs](https://www.facebook.com/indianitjobs)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
